about_the_game:
Welcome to Lustful Apocalypse.

You play as Wyn, a demonic sorceress who has been asleep for a thousand years. She awakens in a post-apocalyptic world, only to find that her power has been stolen and scattered into crystals.

Endure and reclaim your strength by hunting monsters and collecting demon crystals.

We hope you enjoyed the experience as much as we enjoyed creating it! 

Visit Multiple Locations

Locations available in Early Access include: Subway, The Wasteland and Ruins. Each have unique monsters attached such as Wolves, Orges and Bugs.

Fight & Breed with Monsters

Fight Wolves, Orges and Insects or even breed with them to create your army.

Join Factions, Complete Quests

You can currently join the Orge Faction which will tie into later game updates. Questing is also  available for the player to gain power.

Explore the Subway, Collect Crystals and Power

In this current build, you can explore the subway in 'Explore Mode'. Collect Crystals and Fight Wolves, even join the Orge Faction!

Summon Objects

Only Dragon Dildo available currently, which you can summon if you have enough power.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature content in Lustful Apocalypse is based around sex and oral sex with monsters such as Wolfs, Creatures and Orges. The player can also breed with monsters and become pregnant, which will produce children, being another mechanics which goes towards using monsters to fight other monsters.

If the player loses a battle, the monsters will force themselves upon the player, and in Explore mode, small hugger like creatures will chase the player to engage in sex with them.

name: Lustful Apocalypse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU, x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
